text: Branko Cvejić (; 25 August 1946 – 26 July 2022) was a Serbian actor. He was known for his roles in Grlom u jagode, The Elusive Summer of '68 and Balkan Express. Cvejić was born in Belgrade, Serbia. His career began in 1962. Cvejić died on 26 July 2022 in Belgrade at the age of 75.Preminuo glumac Branko Cvejić ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1946 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Actors from Belgrade Category:Serbian movie actors Category:Serbian television actors
title: Branko Cvejić
